content.description: Climb the inside left facing corner.
content.protection: Protects well. Standard sizes up to #3 Camalot sized.
content.location: Far right corner when facing the wall. Where the prominent pillar meets the walls face on the North side of the pillar. Directly right from Digger O`dell and left from Northern Pillar.

content.description:
Pigs in Space is the dominating (there are several, Pigs has a chockstone in it up high) left leaning hands to fist crack (face climbing last 10ft) that starts at average chest height and goes to the top. It is overhanging the entire way. Protection is plentiful but beware that there is potential to fall onto some boulders; mitigate this risk by placing ample pro.  

  Note: there are face holds along the way if you wish to use
content.protection: Camalot sizes: 1, 2, 3 and 4 for the crack and up higher you have options (nuts, hexes, cams, etc)
content.location: Smack in the middle of the wall!

content.description: Slightly overhanging. Follow the hand/finger crack up to the top passing some horizontals. Obvious line.
content.location: North facing wall of prominent pillar in the Coroner Area.

content.description: Climb the left facing `sawtooth` corner/flake. Use the flake and whatever the faces allow.
content.protection: Well protected. Standard rack up to #4 size. #4 size gear not needed but helpful.
content.location: Left facing corner/flake directly left of Stomach Contents. Its the obvious sawtooth feature on the right side of the wall.

content.description: Usually shady. Never crowded. Mostly solid rock. Home to the amazing continually overhanging constant left leaning hands to fist crack named 'Pigs in Space.'
